text:
SUGGESTED FACILITIES
FOR EQUIPMENT WIRING
EQUIPMENT KEY
A—Audio and Test Equipment
B—Control Unit
C—Oscillator Amplifier
D—Power Amplifier
E—Antenna Control Equipment
F—Automatic Voltage Regulator
G—Power Distribution Cabinet
H—Rectifier
I—High Voltage Transformer
J—Retardation Coil
K—Filter Condenser
L—Speech Input Console and
Turntables
M—Control Desk
S—Customer's Power Service and
Metering Panel
